tool_description: Discover the beauty of Canada with the Canada Sync API! 🍁 Explore beyond boundaries with features like fetching facilities, calculating distances, detailed directions, address validation, phone number verification, and air quality checks. But wait, there's more!
name: Canada Sync API
title: Canada Sync API

api_list.name: CAD Exchange Rates
api_list.description: Retrieve up-to-date exchange rates for multiple currencies or a specific currency.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description:
Destination currency code or multiple codes separated by commas.
Find: [All Supported Currencies](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/supported-currencies)

api_list.name: Currency Converter
api_list.description: Perform precise currency conversion with real-time exchange rates.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount to convert.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description:
The destination currency code.
Find: [All Supported Currencies](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/supported-currencies)

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description:
The source currency code (default: CAD).
Find: [All Supported Currencies](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/supported-currencies)

api_list.name: Holidays by Type
api_list.description: This endpoint provides information about holidays in Canada based on a specific holiday type.

required_parameters.name: id_code
required_parameters.description: The [identifier](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/holidays-'id_code'-list) for the specific holiday type.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which holiday information is requested. If not provided, the current year is used.

api_list.name: Province Holidays
api_list.description: Fetch holidays for a specific province and year.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which holidays are to be fetched.

required_parameters.name: prov
required_parameters.description: Province code (e.g., *ON* for Ontario).

api_list.name: Holidays Calendar
api_list.description: Fetch holidays for a specific year.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which holidays are to be fetched.

optional_parameters.name: federal
optional_parameters.description: Federal parameter (true, false, or all).

api_list.name: Events in Canada
api_list.description: Retrieve events based on query parameters.

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: (Month, required): An integer representing the month for which events should be retrieved (e.g., 1 for January, 12 for December). If not provided, the API uses the current Month.

required_parameters.name: prov
required_parameters.description: (Province Code, required): A two-letter code representing the Canadian province (e.g., AB, BC, ON).

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: (Optional): The name of the city for more specific event information. If not provided, events for the entire province are returned.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: (Optional): An integer representing the day of the month for additional filtering.

api_list.name: Marine Report
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves marine weather conditions for a specific marine area. Users can specify the marine code [(m_code)](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/marine-weather-'m_code'-list), language (lang), date, and month to get the weather conditions.

required_parameters.name: m_code
required_parameters.description:
Marine area code.
Please check the full list here: [m_code](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/marine-weather-'m_code'-list)

optional_parameters.name: month
optional_parameters.description: Month for the weather report. Defaults to the current month if not provided.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Day of the month for the weather report. Defaults to the current day if not provided.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Language for the response. Defaults to English (***en***) if not provided.
Supported Values: **en** (English), **fr** (French)

api_list.name: Hydrometric Report
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves hourly hydrometric reports for a specific hydrometric station. Users can specify the station code, date, and month to get the hourly data.

required_parameters.name: h_code
required_parameters.description:
Hydrometric station code.
Please check the full list here: [h_code](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/hydrometric-'h_code'-list)

optional_parameters.name: month
optional_parameters.description: Month for the report. Defaults to the current month if not provided.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Day of the month for the report. Defaults to the current day if not provided.

api_list.name: Hydrometric Stations
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves information about hydrometric stations. Users can filter stations based on the province code.

required_parameters.name: province_code
required_parameters.description: Province code to filter hydrometric stations. Supported codes: **AB**, **BC**, **MB**, **NB**, **NL**, **NS**, **NT**, **NU**, **ON**, **PE**, **QC**, **SK**, **YT**.

api_list.name: Air Quality
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve air quality information for a specific region. You can provide the cgndb parameter, which is the identifier for the region in the Canadian Geographical Names Database (CGNDB). The lang parameter is optional and determines the language of the response (default is English).

required_parameters.name: cgndb
required_parameters.description: The [CGNDB identifier](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/weather-air-quality-'cgndb'-mappings) for the region.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language for the response (default is English). Possible values: ***en*** (English), ***fr*** (French).

api_list.name: Weather Conditions
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves weather conditions for a specific location in Canada. Users can specify parameters such as [site code](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/weather-conditions-'site_code'-mappings), language, date,  and month to get accurate and up-to-date weather information. It utilizes weather data from the Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC).

required_parameters.name: site_code
required_parameters.description: The [site code](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/canada-sync-api/tutorials/weather-conditions-'site_code'-mappings) of the location.

optional_parameters.name: month
optional_parameters.description: The month for which weather information is requested. Default is the current month.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: The day for which weather information is requested. Default is the current day.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language for the weather information. Default is English (***en***). Supports English (**en**) and French (**fr**).

api_list.name: Postal Code Address
api_list.description: This endpoint enables you to get address details based on a given postal code in Canada.

required_parameters.name: postcode
required_parameters.description: The postal code for which you want to retrieve address details.

api_list.name: Directions
api_list.description: This endpoint enables you to get directions and route information between two locations. You can provide the starting and ending coordinates, and the API will use OSRM to calculate the distance, duration, and steps.

required_parameters.name: lat2
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the ending location.

required_parameters.name: lon1
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the starting location.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the starting location.

required_parameters.name: lon2
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the ending location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance measurement (***km*** for kilometers, ***mi*** for miles, ***ft*** for feet, ***yd*** for yards).

api_list.name: Distance Reverse
api_list.description: This endpoint enables you to calculate the distance and duration between two locations based on their addresses. You can provide the start and stop addresses, and the API will use Nominatim for geocoding and OSRM for routing to determine the distance and duration.

required_parameters.name: stop_address
required_parameters.description: The address of the ending location.

required_parameters.name: start_address
required_parameters.description: The address of the starting location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance measurement (***km*** for kilometers, ***mi*** for miles, ***ft*** for feet, ***yd*** for yards).

api_list.name: Distance
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to calculate the distance and duration between two locations. You can specify the latitude and longitude coordinates of the starting and ending points, as well as customize the unit of distance measurement (e.g., kilometers, miles).

required_parameters.name: lat2
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the ending point.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the starting point.

required_parameters.name: lon2
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the ending point.

required_parameters.name: lon1
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the starting point.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance measurement (***km*** for kilometers, ***mi*** for miles, ***ft*** for feet, ***yd*** for yards).

api_list.name: Validate Phone Number
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to validate a phone number as a Canadian number and retrieve comprehensive details. It checks the validity of the number, provides information on the phone type (e.g., mobile, fixed line), offers the geographic location (city, province), identifies the carrier, and specifies the time zone.

required_parameters.name: phone_number
required_parameters.description: The phone number to be validated.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language for additional information.

api_list.name: Facilities in Canada
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve [various amenities](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_features#Amenity) in Canada based on specified parameters such as facility type, region, and city. You can also use pagination to limit the number of results.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of [amenity](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_features#Amenity) to search for.

optional_parameters.name: prov
optional_parameters.description: The province in Canada.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of results.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city in Canada.
